EmailTemplate.subject: Upgrade your Displays – Honeywell’s DU-870 to DU-875 Offering
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Optimize your cockpit experience with our DU-875 trade-in offer: clear information, clear benefits, clear skies Trade in your old DU-870 CRT display for a new DU-875 LCD one and get $35,000 off for each upgrade you make. With a 12-month warranty and a $2,500 discount on your Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan (MSP) Avionics contract per display unit, you get financial and operational benefits and enhance safety and comfort for your pilots.
Further benefits include:
- Increased reliability over CRT displays which halts obsolescence - Lower fuel costs as an LCD display is seven pounds lighter than a CRT one - Installation is quick and easy and needs no new wiring - LCD displays are brighter, quieter and easier to use - Retention of current display formats, symbology and color sets - Lower ownership and MSP Avionics costs - The possibility to replace display units one at a time or all displays at once UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/du-875-promo-price?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_emeai_bga_cockpitdisplays]]>
